unnormalised: Konnen-eka maka vicharle online-cher aslolea hea sogllea pixe discount-anchem karann kitem mhunn, khas korun Flipkartachea Big Billion Days sarkhea sales-ant. Sot sangum zalear, ti vostu zaitea vostunchem mixranv asa, bhai.
normalised: Konnen tor mhaka vicharle online asa tea sagllea crazy discounts chem deal kitem mhunn, khas korun Flipkart chea Big Billion Days sarkhea sales vellar. Satya sangtalea, tem sagllea vostuncha mix asat, bhav.

unnormalised: Poilem mhunnlear, tacho zaiteoso bhag fokot bore poramporik marketing asa. Te MRP (Maximum Retail Price) vaddoitat, udharonnak zata mhunn 20% tanim vaddounk, magir "vhodlem" 50% discount ditat tem chalu korunk fattrak bore dista mhunn. Dekhun, tum asli jem jem asllem, tem 50% chuktuch na tum. Te lokamcher patyeun ravtat tanchem research korunk na ani fokot "deal" kortalem.
normalised: Poile suvater, tacheantlean zaite marketing asat. Te M-R-P (Maximum Retail Price) vaddoytat, sumar viser (20) percent vaddoytat, magir "mothe" panchvis (50) percent discount detat ani atractive dista mhunn dakoytat. Mhunnje, asli kimati kitlea asunk zai tachea uprant tunvem panchvis percent dhon urovonk na. Te lokanchea research korina nastana "deal" kacheruch jump kortat tacher depend asat.

unnormalised: Ani magir puronneasto stock-ichi vostu asa. Companies-ak pattle season-achim phones, models vo kitem-i tori saf korpache zai asta. Tumka 4GB RAM aslelem phone mellpak xokta jem ek vors purvilen release kelolem jem Rs. 8,000-ank tumka chori sarkhea demant mellta, punn tuka bore utom utom vikalp mellta tum sodya aslolea vostun-cher bhair dekhun.
normalised: Magir puronne stock astana vostu astali, tichem kitem asa te asa. Companies korta te last season che phones, models, va kitem assa tem clear koronk zai podta. Tunvem chyar gigabyte R-A-M assalelea phone ek varsha poile release kelo ani aath hajar rupia vikte ghetla, punn zaite better options asa tumi bhonvtonn passun pollounk.

unnormalised: Kedna-kedna, discounts khorech ditle asat khas brand-anchi bhikar vaddounk. Eka tharaik headphones-ancher Rs. 1500-anchem limited-time discount vo SBI sarkhem credit card vaporn ditle mhunn 10% cashback tum vichar kor, vo. Tankam bazaracha vatta vadounk totta ghevpak tayar asat.
normalised: Kedanna kedanna, discounts legitimate asta khas brandsank tanchea sales volume vaddovonk. Sumar ek hajar panchshe (1500) rupia discount astalelim headphones va dhaa percent cashback ek khas credit card vaprun like S-B-I. Te vellak hit ghevn market share hadunk mandik astole.

unnormalised: Ani chukiche reviews ani fovot sellers-acher zagaar rav! Hanvem eka pavtim Rs. 499-ank "khorem" leather wallet viktem ghetlem, punn tem plastic-an boroilelem asllem. "Buy now" click korchea adhi sellers-anche ratings ani product reviews sodanch chukit asat, khas korun khup discounts aslolea vostun-cher. Thodkean, huxearik viktem ghet, dem-ank tulna kor ani fokot vhodd numbers-ank bhul naka!
normalised: Ani nimanne, fake reviews ani dodgy sellers passar watch out kor. Hanven ekdam "genuine" leather wallet chyaar she ani nuyenve (499) rupiak ghetlem, punn taka plastic aslelem. Always check seller ratings ani product reviews clicking "buy now" korche poile, khas korun vhodd discounts astalele vostuncha. Basically, shop smart, compare prices, ani matren vhodd numbers pasar get swayed zaunaka.
